specials.name: Change Shape
specials.description: (concentrate, occult, polymorph, transmutation) Sulkimy can take on the appearance of a human or a Small or Medium bat. It loses its stench aura while transformed. In human form it also loses its Strikes but can make fist Strikes that deal the same amount of bludgeoning damage as its talon Strike.

specials.name: Feed on Sorrow
specials.description: (concentrate, healing, necromancy, occult, positive) Frequency once per round; Effect Sulkimy draws strength from the suffering of others. It regains 10 Hit Points for each enemy within 30 feet that has one of the following conditions, to a maximum of 40 Hit Points: confused, doomed, dying, enfeebled, fatigued, frightened, sickened, slowed, stunned, stupefied, or wounded.

specials.name: (F)
specials.description: Trigger Sulkimy moves an object with mage hand or telekinetic haul, controls a creature with dominate, or casts animated assault; Effect Sulkimy casts ghost sound or ventriloquism, with the sound originating from the target or area of the spell.Shameful Loathing (curse, emotion, enchantment, mental, occult) A creature damaged by Sulkimy’s jaws is overcome with shame and self-hatred and must attempt a DC 36 Will save.

strikes.name: jaws
strikes.damage: 5d10+15 piercing plus 1d10 mental and shameful loathing
